text:
Standard V(C) Record Retention
Members and Candidates must develop and maintain appropriate records
to support their investment analyses, recommendations, actions, and other
investment-related communications with clients and prospective clients.
Members must maintain research records that support the reasons for the analyst's
conclusions and any investment actions taken. Such records are the property of the
firm. All communications with clients through any medium, including emails and text
messages, are records that must be retained.
